mapper.select:
select a.orgcode "YLJGDM",-- 医疗机构代码 VARCHAR 22 必填 复合主键：采用22位“卫生机构代码” to_char(to_date(#{begtime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), 'YYYYMMDD') "YWRQ",-- 统计日期 VARCHAR 8 必填 复合主键：是指业务发生的日期YYYYMMDD a.orgname "YLJGMC",-- 医疗机构名称 VARCHAR 70 必填 医院执业许可第一名称 '0' "FYDM",-- 分院代码 VARCHAR 20 必填 记录分院代码（内码）,如无分院，则传0 '' "FYMC",-- 分院名称 VARCHAR 120 条件必填 分院代码不为0时必填 c.num "HDCWZS",-- 核定（编制）床位总数 NUMERIC 15 必填 d.num "SJKFCWZS",-- 实际开放床位总数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(e.num, 0) "RYRS",-- 入院人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(f.num, 0) "CYRS",-- 出院人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(round(g.num / f.num,0), 0) "CYHZPJZYL",-- 出院患者平均住院日 NUMERIC 15 必填 round(h.totcost / f.num, 2) "CYHZJCFY",-- 出院患者均次费用 NUMERIC 18,2 必填 nvl(i.num, 0) "ZYSSTS",-- 住院手术台数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(j.num, 0) "ZYRS",-- 在院人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(k.num, 0) "BWRS",-- 其中：病危人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(l.num, 0) "BZRS",-- 其中：病重人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(m.num, 0) "TJHLRS",-- 其中：特级护理人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 每天晚上12点统计的数值 nvl(n.num, 0) "YJHLRS",-- 其中：一级护理人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 每天晚上12点统计的数值 nvl(o.num, 0) "EJHLRS",-- 其中：二级护理人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 每天晚上12点统计的数值 0 "ZZJKSRS",-- 其中：重症监护室人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 round(nvl(p.totcost, 0), 2) "ZFY",-- 住院总费用 NUMERIC 18,2 必填 round(nvl(q.totcost, 0), 2) "YPFY",-- 其中：药品费用 NUMERIC 18,2 必填 round(nvl(r.totcost, 0), 2) "JBYWFY",-- 其中：基本药物费用 NUMERIC 18,2 必填 round(nvl(s.totcost, 0), 2) "JCYWFY",-- 其中：集采药物费用 NUMERIC 18,2 必填 round(nvl(t.totcost, 0), 2) "YLFWFY",-- 其中：医疗服务费用 NUMERIC 18,2 必填 round(nvl(u.totcost, 0), 2) "HCFY",-- 其中：耗材费用 NUMERIC 18,2 必填 nvl(v.num, 0) "JYBGDS",-- 检验报告单数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(w.num, 0) "LCJYBGDS",-- 其中：临床检验报告单数 NUMERIC 15 必填 0 "BLJYBGDS",-- 其中：病理检验报告单数 NUMERIC 15 必填 0 "HYXJYBGDS",-- 其中：核医学检验报告单数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(v.num, 0) - nvl(w.num, 0) "QTJYBGDS",-- 其中：其他检验报告单数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(x.num, 0) "JCBGDS",-- 检查报告单数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(y.num, 0) "XDLBGDS",-- 其中：心电类报告单数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(z.num, 0) "FSLBGDS",-- 其中：放射类报告单数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(aa.num, 0) "CSLBGDS",-- 其中：超声类报告单数 NUMERIC 15 必填 0 "NJLBGDS",-- 其中：内镜类报告单数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(ab.num, 0) "CTLBGDS",-- 其中：CT类报告单数 NUMERIC 15 必填 0 "HCLBGDS",-- 其中：核磁类报告单数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(x.num, 0) - nvl(y.num, 0) - nvl(z.num, 0) - nvl(aa.num, 0) "QTLBGDS",-- 其中：其他类报 告单数 NUMERIC 15 必填 to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "TBRQ" -- 填报日期 DATETIME 必填 本条数据采集时间，格式YYYY-MM-DD from com_hospitalinfo a left join (select count(orgcode) num, orgcode from COM_BEDINFO group by orgcode) c on c.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select count(orgcode) num, orgcode from COM_BEDINFO where BEDSTATE <> '9' group by orgcode) d on d.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select count(orgcode) num, orgcode from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and indate >= to_date(#{begtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and indate <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') group by orgcode) e on e.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select count(orgcode) num, orgcode from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and out_date >= to_date(#{begtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and out_date <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') group by orgcode) f on f.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select sum(num) num, orgcode from (select case when floor(out_date - indate) <= 1 then 1 else floor(out_date - indate) + 1 end as num , orgcode from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and out_date >= to_date(#{begtime} , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and out_date <= to_date(#{endtime} , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ) group by orgcode) g on g.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select sum(a.totcost) totcost, a.orgcode from (select orgcode, totcost, inid from ips_feedetail union all select orgcode, totcost, inid from ips_outfeedetail ) a, ipr_inpatientinfo b where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.inid = b.inid and b.instate <> '0' and b.out_date >= to_date(#{begtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and b.out_date <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') group by a.orgcode) h on h.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select count(orgcode) num, orgcode from emr_operationinfo where visit_id in (select inid from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and orgcode = #{orgcode} ) and ARRANGE_DATE >= to_date(#{begtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and ARRANGE_DATE <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') group by orgcode) i on i.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select count(orgcode) num, orgcode from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and out_date >= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') or out_date is null group by orgcode) j on j.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select count(orgcode) num, orgcode from INR_RECEIVEINFO where inid in (select inid from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and orgcode = #{orgcode} and out_date >= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') or out_date is null) and PATIENTLEVEL = '3' group by orgcode) K on K.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select count(orgcode) num, orgcode from INR_RECEIVEINFO where inid in (select inid from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and orgcode = #{orgcode} and out_date >= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') or out_date is null) and PATIENTLEVEL = '2' group by orgcode) l on l.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select count(orgcode) num, orgcode from INR_RECEIVEINFO where inid in (select inid from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and orgcode = #{orgcode} and out_date >= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') or out_date is null) and CARELEVEL = '0' group by orgcode) m on m.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select count(orgcode) num, orgcode from INR_RECEIVEINFO where inid in (select inid from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and orgcode = #{orgcode} and out_date >= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') or out_date is null) and CARELEVEL = '1' group by orgcode) n on n.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select count(orgcode) num, orgcode from INR_RECEIVEINFO where inid in (select inid from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and orgcode = #{orgcode} and out_date >= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') or out_date is null) and CARELEVEL = '2' group by orgcode) o on o.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select sum(a.totcost) totcost, a.orgcode from (select orgcode, totcost, inid, FEEOPTDATE from ips_feedetail union all select orgcode, totcost, inid, FEEOPTDATE from ips_outfeedetail ) a, ipr_inpatientinfo b where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.inid = b.inid and b.instate <> '0' and a.FEEOPTDATE >= to_date(#{begtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.FEEOPTDATE <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') group by a.orgcode) p on p.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select sum(a.totcost) totcost, a.orgcode from (select orgcode, totcost, inid, itemtype, FEEOPTDATE from ips_feedetail union all select orgcode, totcost, inid, itemtype, FEEOPTDATE from ips_outfeedetail ) a, ipr_inpatientinfo b where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.inid = b.inid and b.instate <> '0' and a.itemtype = '1' and a.FEEOPTDATE >= to_date(#{begtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.FEEOPTDATE <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') group by a.orgcode) q on q.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select sum(a.totcost) totcost, a.orgcode from (select orgcode, totcost, inid, itemcode, FEEOPTDATE, itemtype from ips_feedetail union all select orgcode, totcost, inid, itemcode, FEEOPTDATE, itemtype from ips_outfeedetail ) a, ipr_inpatientinfo b, PHA_DRUGINFO c where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.inid = b.inid and a.orgcode = c.orgcode and a.itemcode = c.drugcode and c.ESSDRUG = '1' and b.instate <> '0' and a.itemtype = '1' and a.FEEOPTDATE >= to_date(#{begtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.FEEOPTDATE <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') group by a.orgcode) r on r.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select sum(a.totcost) totcost, a.orgcode from (select orgcode, totcost, inid, itemcode, FEEOPTDATE, itemtype from ips_feedetail union all select orgcode, totcost, inid, itemcode, FEEOPTDATE, itemtype from ips_outfeedetail ) a, ipr_inpatientinfo b, PHA_DRUGINFO c where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.inid = b.inid and a.orgcode = c.orgcode and a.itemcode = c.drugcode and c.CENPURCH = '1' and b.instate <> '0' and a.itemtype = '1' and a.FEEOPTDATE >= to_date(#{begtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.FEEOPTDATE <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') group by a.orgcode) s on s.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select sum(a.totcost) totcost, a.orgcode from (select orgcode, totcost, inid, itemcode, FEEOPTDATE, itemtype from ips_feedetail union all select orgcode, totcost, inid, itemcode, FEEOPTDATE, itemtype from ips_outfeedetail ) a, ipr_inpatientinfo b, FIN_UNDRUGINFO c where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.inid = b.inid and a.orgcode = c.orgcode and a.itemcode = c.itemcode and b.instate <> '0' and a.FEEOPTDATE >= to_date(#{begtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.FEEOPTDATE <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') group by a.orgcode) t on t.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select sum(a.totcost) totcost, a.orgcode from (select orgcode, totcost, inid, itemcode, FEEOPTDATE, itemtype from ips_feedetail union all select orgcode, totcost, inid, itemcode, FEEOPTDATE, itemtype from ips_outfeedetail ) a, ipr_inpatientinfo b, pha_medcon c where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.inid = b.inid and a.orgcode = c.orgcode and a.itemcode = c.MEDLISTCODG and b.instate <> '0' and a.FEEOPTDATE >= to_date(#{begtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.FEEOPTDATE <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') group by a.orgcode) u on u.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select count(a.orgcode) num, a.orgcode from MET_CHECKAPPLY_INFO a, IPR_INPATIENTINFO b where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.PATIENTBUSIID = b.inid and b.instate <> '0' and a.APPLYTYPE = '1' and a.APPLYSOURCE = '2' and a.EXECFLAG = '3' and a.UPDT_TIME >= to_date(#{begtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.UPDT_TIME <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') group by a.orgcode) v on v.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select count(a.orgcode) num, a.orgcode from MET_CHECKAPPLY_INFO a, IPR_INPATIENTINFO b, (select orgcode, inid, itemcode, applyid from ips_feedetail union all select orgcode, inid, itemcode, applyid from ips_outfeedetail ) c, FIN_UNDRUGINFO d where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.PATIENTBUSIID = b.inid and a.orgcode = c.orgcode and a.PATIENTBUSIID = c.inid and a.applyid = c.applyid and c.orgcode = d.orgcode and c.itemcode = d.itemcode and d.EXAMINETYPE = '13' and b.instate <> '0' and a.APPLYTYPE = '1' and a.APPLYSOURCE = '2' and a.EXECFLAG = '3' and a.UPDT_TIME >= to_date(#{begtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.UPDT_TIME <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') group by a.orgcode) w on w.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select count(a.orgcode) num, a.orgcode from MET_CHECKAPPLY_INFO a, IPR_INPATIENTINFO b where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.PATIENTBUSIID = b.inid and b.instate <> '0' and a.APPLYTYPE = '2' and a.APPLYSOURCE = '2' and a.EXECFLAG = '3' and a.UPDT_TIME >= to_date(#{begtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.UPDT_TIME <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') group by a.orgcode) x on x.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select count(a.orgcode) num, a.orgcode from MET_CHECKAPPLY_INFO a, IPR_INPATIENTINFO b, (select orgcode, inid, itemcode, applyid from ips_feedetail union all select orgcode, inid, itemcode, applyid from ips_outfeedetail ) c, FIN_UNDRUGINFO d where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.PATIENTBUSIID = b.inid and a.orgcode = c.orgcode and a.PATIENTBUSIID = c.inid and a.applyid = c.applyid and c.orgcode = d.orgcode and c.itemcode = d.itemcode and d.EXAMINETYPE = '16' and b.instate <> '0' and a.APPLYTYPE = '2' and a.APPLYSOURCE = '2' and a.EXECFLAG = '3' and a.UPDT_TIME >= to_date(#{begtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.UPDT_TIME <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') group by a.orgcode) y on y.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select count(a.orgcode) num, a.orgcode from MET_CHECKAPPLY_INFO a, IPR_INPATIENTINFO b, (select orgcode, inid, itemcode, applyid from ips_feedetail union all select orgcode, inid, itemcode, applyid from ips_outfeedetail ) c, FIN_UNDRUGINFO d where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.PATIENTBUSIID = b.inid and a.orgcode = c.orgcode and a.PATIENTBUSIID = c.inid and a.applyid = c.applyid and c.orgcode = d.orgcode and c.itemcode = d.itemcode and d.EXAMINETYPE = '3' and b.instate <> '0' and a.APPLYTYPE = '2' and a.APPLYSOURCE = '2' and a.EXECFLAG = '3' and a.UPDT_TIME >= to_date(#{begtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.UPDT_TIME <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') group by a.orgcode) z on z.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select count(a.orgcode) num, a.orgcode from MET_CHECKAPPLY_INFO a, IPR_INPATIENTINFO b, (select orgcode, inid, itemcode, applyid from ips_feedetail union all select orgcode, inid, itemcode, applyid from ips_outfeedetail ) c, FIN_UNDRUGINFO d where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.PATIENTBUSIID = b.inid and a.orgcode = c.orgcode and a.PATIENTBUSIID = c.inid and a.applyid = c.applyid and c.orgcode = d.orgcode and c.itemcode = d.itemcode and d.EXAMINETYPE = '7' and b.instate <> '0' and a.APPLYTYPE = '2' and a.APPLYSOURCE = '2' and a.EXECFLAG = '3' and a.UPDT_TIME >= to_date(#{begtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.UPDT_TIME <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') group by a.orgcode) aa on aa.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select count(a.orgcode) num, a.orgcode from MET_CHECKAPPLY_INFO a, IPR_INPATIENTINFO b, (select orgcode, inid, itemcode, applyid from ips_feedetail union all select orgcode, inid, itemcode, applyid from ips_outfeedetail ) c, FIN_UNDRUGINFO d where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.PATIENTBUSIID = b.inid and a.orgcode = c.orgcode and a.PATIENTBUSIID = c.inid and a.applyid = c.applyid and c.orgcode = d.orgcode and c.itemcode = d.itemcode and d.EXAMINETYPE = '22' and b.instate <> '0' and a.APPLYTYPE = '2' and a.APPLYSOURCE = '2' and a.EXECFLAG = '3' and a.UPDT_TIME >= to_date(#{begtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.UPDT_TIME <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') group by a.orgcode) ab on ab.orgcode = a.orgcode
where a.orgcode = #{orgcode}
